data.author: Patrick Van Cauteren

changelog.release_notes: Moved location of configuration page because of DropBox's changed policy regarding HTML pages.

Added support for other languages.
Supported languages are: English, Dutch, French, German, Spanish and Italian.

Follow-up of PVC's Essentials.

Just like my Essentials, it is intended to for people that just need the essential information (time, day of the week, day of the month, battery status, bluetooth status) and prefer a bigger font.

Differences with my Essentials are: the font size is now 50pt instead of 42pt, changed layout to fit with the bigger font, and 3 short vibrations when bluetooth connection is lost.

Weekdays are still shown in dutch only.  Will add other languages as soon as I have time to add configuration possibilities.

data.description:
Follow-up of PVC's Essentials.

Just like my Essentials, it is intended to for people that just need the essential information (time, day of the week, day of the month, battery status, bluetooth status) and prefer a bigger font.

Differences with my Essentials are: the font size is now 50pt instead of 42pt, changed layout to fit with the bigger font, and 3 short vibrations when bluetooth connection is lost.

Supported languages for the weekdays are: English, Dutch, French, German, Spanish and Italian.

latest_release.release_notes: Moved location of configuration page because of DropBox's changed policy regarding HTML pages.

data.title: PVC's Biggy
